name: Mîkiwâm
description:
Mîkiwâm is an Indigenous fantasy narrative set in a healing world. 

Features:

  • an Indigenous-fantasy world set in the aftermath of decolonization
  • magic elemental tea-making gameplay! boil pretty plants in a kettle! 
  • the choice of tea you serve influences other characters
  • investigate the mysterious disappearance of Kohkum
  • art drawn by Cree artist Caeleigh Lightning

In one small community, the healer Kohkom has disappeared. Play as Awâsis, the healer’s apprentice, and experience magic elemental tea-blending gameplay. Influence the lives of a colourful cast of characters using the plants you gather. Connect with your estranged home, discover your gifts, and solve the mystery of who Kohkom really was. Meet Awâsis in the gameplay demo now and look forward to future chapters in progress. 

Download will be made available on October 20 at the beginning of imagineNATIVE film + media arts festival!
